description.value:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.VRUYc3QyRjjOjppc]{Turpin Rowe Lumberjack}
Prerequisites Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication

When you are climbing a wooden surface and have a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LGgvev6AV0So8tP9]{Hatchet} or @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.War0uyLBx1jA0Ge7]{Battle Axe} in each hand, you have a climb Speed equal to half your normal Speed. You must still have both legs available to climb and canâ€™t use either of the axes in combat while climbing. This feat can also be used to climb a surface of ice if you have a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.RbM4HvPyrZ4YJxRc]{Light Pick} in each hand.
